Text.Page:
No pirate ship has left, so the dementalith must be upstairs somewhere. And we're gonna track it down.

Talk to Piarto upstairs. He's gathering intelligence up there. On the way, kill some {@LinkCreature:11#2007#Red Lash slayers} so we don't face such tough resistance on the second floor.

Oh, and one other thing: Piarto is a master of disguise. No telling what he looks like.

Otus sent you, right? Good. I was starting to think they'd forgotten about me.

A dementalith, eh? No, haven't heard anything about it.

You're welcome to look around, though.
